parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Fillet item for which to set ConicRhoVal (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ConicRhoVal
parameters.description: Conic rho, conic radius, or circular radius (see Remarks )

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.ISetConicRhoOrRadius
description: Sets the conic rho, conic radius, or circular radius of this fillet.
signature:
void ISetConicRhoOrRadius( 
   System.Object
PFilletItem
,
   System.Double
ConicRhoVal
)

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Fillet item for which to set ConicRhoVal (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ConicRhoVal
parameters.description: Conic rho, conic radius, or circular radius (see Remarks )

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::IGetFilletItemAtIndex
to get the pointer with which to specify PFilletItem.
The value specified in ConicRhoVal must match the
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::ConicTypeForCrossSectionProfile
setting.
If setting the conic rho value, it must be in the range [0.05, 0.95].
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
